recipe.title: Hot White Russian
ingredients: 1/2 cup Kahl&úa or other coffee-flavored liqueur, or to taste
whipped heavy cream for garnish if desired
instructions: In a saucepan stir together the coffee, the 1/2 cup cream, the Kahl:a, and the vodka and heat the mixture over moderate heat until it is hot. Divide the mixture among heated mugs and garnish each drink with some of the whipped cream.
